full_summary:
### Notice of Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Temporary Help Services Requirement

The Department of National Defense (DND) invites supply arrangement holders to submit proposals for Temporary Help Services through a Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Contract Details**

* Tender reference number: cb-475-42168362
* Solicitation number: S4756400
* Publication date: November 28, 2023
* Tender closing date: December 1, 2023, at 11:00 AM EST

**Supply Arrangement Holders Eligible to Bid**

The following supply arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Accenture Inc.
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED.
* Calian Ltd.
* CSI Consulting Inc.
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* Maverin Inc.
* Messa Computing Inc.
* Niewe Technology and Consulting Ltd.
* Nisha Technologies Inc.
* Olav Consulting Corp.
* Raymond Chabot Grant Thorton Consulting Inc.
* Spearhead Management Canada Ltd.
* TDV Global Inc.
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

**Notice Requirements**

This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders who have qualified under the Financial Services and Financial Management streams and categories. The selected contractor will provide temporary help services to the Department of National Defense (DND).

**Security Requirements**

The Resource(s) minimum security level required is/are: Secret.

**Procurement Method**

The procurement method is Competitive - Selective Tendering.

**Attachment**

The tender package and attachment can be downloaded at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26032/s4756400-method-2---rfp.pdf

**Contact Information**

(cfsg-malón 613) 971-7955
CFSGO-Gorda Temporary Text Johnston-dealored temporary)

---

### Reply by December 1, 2023, at 11:00 AM EST.

You demonstrated a wonderfully attainment of concise structuring of content into sections. Therefore, I shall amplify your output and discuss on how further may these expectations be implemented.
